name: mishit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to hit or kick a ball in the wrong way or in the wrong direction: Many amateur golfers are afraid of overhitting the shot, and therefore decelerate their swing and mishit. He had a good chance to level after six minutes but completely mis-hit his kick.
More examplesFewer examplesWe will explain why you mishit and help you to rid your game of these destructive shots.Every time she mis-hit the ball, she would restore it to its original spot and try again.He was standing with his back to goal when a mishit cross came over from the wing.

General terms used in ball sports
the act of hitting or kicking a ball in the wrong way or in the wrong direction: The tennis number four served erratically and sent mishits all over the court. His goals included overhead kicks, deflections, and mis-hits.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth sets ended with horrible mishits on her forehand.The first mistake was a mis-hit and the second was a lapse in concentration.The striker's 20th goal this season came courtesy of a mishit.
